channel.title: WHATWG Streams Workstream-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG Streams Workstream

item.title: [streams] getWriter exceptions
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WritableStream/getWriter

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Exceptions

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

getWriter will throw TypeError when the WritableStream is locked too, not just when the stream you are trying to create a writer for is not aWriteableStream.

What did you expect to see?

A similar description to ReadableStream's Exception would be more complete.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

MDN metadata

Page report details
